issue.title: [C++][Docs] Add note about tdigest in compute functions docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13521](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13521). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Users who are looking for an approximate quantile kernel might not recognize that `tdigest` is this. Add a note in `docs/source/cpp/compute.rst` saying that `tdigest` outputs the approximate quantile.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13521?focusedCommentId=17400611) by Ian Cook (icook):*
There is a fix for this in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10887
